meanings.definition: A representation of a small angel, often depicted as a child with wings.
meanings.sent1: The church had beautiful cherubims painted on the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: I saw cherubims carved into the marble statue.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cherubims seemed to be playing hide-and-seek in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the fluttering wings of cherubims.
meanings.sent5: In her dream, she was surrounded by a choir of cherubims singing sweet melodies.
